perfectly+generic object.description: An item that is completely and totally generic.

completely+useless object.description: An item that is absolutely useless. Yes, this is a challenge.

captchalogue card.description: An empty captchalogue card... contained in another captchalogue card.

punched card.description: A captchalogue card that has been rendered useless due to being punched by a punch designix. Has the code of another item on it.

cruxite dowel.description: A blue dowel made of some material called Cruxite. Can be carved with a Totem Lathe.

entry item.description: A cruxite item that allows you to enter the Medium.

punch designix.description: A game abstraction used for punching codes onto captchalogue cards.

cruxtruder.description: A game abstraction used for creating cruxite dowels.

sealed cruxtruder.description: A game abstraction used for creating cruxite dowels.

totem lathe.description: A game abstraction used for carving cruxite dowels with punched cards.

alchemiter.description: A game abstraction used for alchemizing new items from codes engraved into dowels.

gristTorrent disc.description: You're like the Robin Hood of stealing shit from your friends.

Sburb disc.description: A CD containing a cool new game called SBURB. You should find a computer and install this puppy. You can't wait to play this game with your friends.

lap top.description: A portable computing device. Quite useful.

desktop computer.description: A large computer setup. Inconvenient to carry around, but still possible with the help of your Sylladex.

pizza cutter.description: A sharp kitchen utensil used for slicing pizzas.

baseball bat.description: A wooden bat made for hitting high-velocity balls.

aluminum bat.description: An aluminum bat made for hitting high-velocity balls.

rolling pin.description: A rolling pin used for flattening dough.

plunger.description: A plunger used for unclogging toilets.

scissors.description: A pair of scissors used for cut paper.

shears.description: A large pair of shears, used for shearing wool and plants.

safety scissors.description: A pair of scissors specially made to prevent the user from harming themselves.

pepper spray.description: A can of self-defense. Useful for dissuading criminals and predators.

chainsaw.description: A saw used for cut trees. Very terrifying.

crowbar.description: A crowbar used for opening doors and crates.

halligan bar.description: A large crowbar used for prying doors off of cars.

broom.description: A standard broom used for sweeping operations.

straw broom.description: A broom made of straw. Looks like something a witch would fly on.

spear.description: A large spear that's made for fighting.

ice pick.description: A scary-looking pick that's used for clinging to ice.

golf club.description: A club used for hitting golf balls. Formidable as a weapon.

hammer.description: A standard claw hammer used for beating nails.

sledge hammer.description: A large hammer used for demolition. Does a lot of damage if it hits.

rubber mallet.description: This is a toy hammer, not a proper rubber mallet... It's a mallet made entirely of rubber.

jump rope.description: A standard rope used for jumping over.

piano wire.description: Thin wire for use as piano strings. Can be used to effectively strangulate targets.

shovel.description: A hefty shovel used for digging.

hatchet.description: A small hatchet. Makes a formidable weapon.

axe.description: A sturdy axe used for chopping trees. It's a powerful weapon.

fire axe.description: A fireman's axe. This is a very powerful weapon and tool.

wooden spoon.description: A wooden spoon used for cooking.

miniature The+Thinker statue.description: A small replica of Auguste Rodin's The Thinker.

woman-sized Statue+of Liberty.description: A woman-sized replica of the Statue of Liberty.

spatula.description: A spatula. Not to be confused with a kitchen turner.

golden spatula.description: A spatula made out of gold.

flat-head screwdriver.description: A flat-headed screwdriver. Careful with that thing.

Phillips screwdriver.description: A Phillips screwdriver. Has a pointy end.

magnetic screwdriver.description: A screwdriver with a magnetic head that helps you align screws.

katana.description: A Japanese sword. Loved by weebs.

cheap piece-of-shit katana.description: A total piece of shit sword that sucks ass.

anime katana.description: A badass anime katana with a diamond-tipped blade that can cut through anything.

rapier.description: A narrow-bladed sword that's designed to be lightweight and sharp.

zweihander.description: A large two-handed sword of German origin.

desk lamp.description: A small lamp for use on a desk.

stun gun.description: A self-defense implement used for non-lethally disarming opponents.

heavy-duty taser.description: A large taser used for taking out perps.

basketball.description: A standard ball used for shooting hoops.

football.description: A football. But what kind of football?

dodgeball.description: A menacing ball used for pelting little kids.

bowling ball.description: A heavy ball that's traditionally used to knock down pins.

rake.description: A tool used for turning leaves on the ground into leaves in a pile.

wooden plank.description: A wooden board. You could wield this and become an inverse pirate.

brass knuckles.description: A pair of heavy knuckles that gives a bit more *oomph* to your punches.

sap.description: A weighted leather implement that you can strap around your hand.

caestus.description: A studded leather glove that can be used to punch down your foes.

mittens.description: A pair of movement-hindering mittens. They're quite warm, though.

gloves.description: Some snug-fitting gloves that keep your hands warm.

silver fork.description: A piece of silverware used for piercing food and moving it to the user's mouth.

trident.description: A three-pronged spear used for fishing or as a polearm. This would be a pretty ironic weapon to wield if you were a fish person or something.

tuning fork.description: A thick metal fork that makes an annoying tone when you strike it with something.

pitch fork.description: A three-pronged device used for handling hay. Also makes a decent improvised weapon.

walking cane.description: A cane used by people who need helping walking. Or by people who want to seem cool and mature.

bull-penis cane.description: A cane fashioned out of a dried bull penis. Don't laugh.

candy cane.description: A small cane made of candy.

curling iron.description: A device used for curling one's hair.

key chain.description: A keychain to help you find your keys.

knife.description: A kitchen knife used for cutting up foods.

butcher knife.description: A hefty knife used for cleaving large chunks of flesh.

pool cue.description: A wooden cue used for sinking pool balls.

sewing needles.description: Small needles used for sewing things together.

knitting needles.description: A pair of needles used for knitting things.

5-pound dumbbell.description: A small 5-pound dumbbell used for exercising.

hockey stick.description: A large wooden stick. It's used to strike pucks around on ice.

vacuum cleaner.description: A suction-producing device that's used for sucking up loose particles.

mop.description: A mop. It's used for cleaning up spills and wiping surfaces clean.

trophy.description: A golden trophy received for winning something. Or getting second place. They really give these things out for anything.

fancy+santa.description: A very fancy-looking Santa figurine. It looks like a normal Santa, but it's filled with self-righteous bullshit.

ladle.description: A stainless metal spoon that's used for serving soup.

extension cable.description: A long cable used for extending electric signals.

clothing iron.description: A tool for ironing the wrinkles out of your clothes.

hack saw.description: A serrated saw meant for cutting metal.

ice skates.description: A pair of skates used for gliding gracefully across ice.

pipe wrench.description: A hefty wrench meant to tighten and loosen threaded pipes.

umbrella.description: An umbrella used to keep the rain off of your head.

bed.description: A piece of furniture used for sleeping.

dresser.description: A piece of furniture used for sleeping.

blanket.description: A blanket for covering oneself with during sleep.

refrigerator.description: A cooling device used to keep food fresh.

pot.description: A metal bowl for boiling things.

frying pan.description: A pan with a convenient handle.

cup.description: A cup for holding liquids in.

mug.description: A large cup. Usually holds coffee.

table.description: A piece of furniture that you put other things on.

grandfather clock.description: A large, fanciful clock. It's somewhat imposing.

clock.description: A clock that hangs on the wall.

fireplace.description: A chamber of hot fires and stones.

bench.description: A thing you sit on. You know, a bench.

arm chair.description: A large, comfy chair. Makes you feel tiny.

couch.description: A couch. A truly beautiful invention.

washing machine.description: A machine. It holds a great aqueous power.

drying machine.description: A machine. It can dry your clothes.

ballpoint pen.description: A standard pen. Said to be mightier than a sword.

#2 pencil.description: A wooden pencil. Has an eraser as well.

fax machine.description: A machine. Like it or not, it is spitting fax.

copying machine.description: A machine. It has the ability to copy documents.

exercise ball.description: A large weighted ball used for various exercises.

boxing gloves.description: A pair of boxing gloves. These are designed to protect the opponent's head and the user's hand.

miku figurine.description: A small figurine of digital singer Hatsune Miku.

anime dvd.description: A DVD with various episodes of an anime.

manga.description: A book of right-to-left drawings that tells a story.

thrasher poster.description: A poster for the band Thrasher.

drum set.description: A set of drums for playing music with.

globe.description: A sphere with a map overlayed onto it.

flute.description: An instrument. It's used by blowing into it and restricting the flow of the air.

grand piano.description: A large piano that looks like it has a tent on top of it.

empty wrapper.description: An empty wrapper for some kind of food.

sord.description: A... sord? You're not exactly sure what this thing is.

smart phone.description: A portable computing device. Don't ask how you can insert discs into this thing.

rc drone.description: A drone that you can fly remotely.

gaming computer.description: A large computer setup. It's tricked out.

cowboy boots.description: A pair of fancy leather cowboy boots.

clown shoes.description: A pair of large clown shoes.

clown nose.description: A red clown nose that squeaks when you squeeze it.

joker figurine.description: A small figurine of a clown.

clown poster.description: A poster of a clown that bears a striking resemblance to Bill Cosby.

red faygo.description: A bottle of red cherry Faygo cola.

cotton+candy faygo.description: A bottle of cottan candy Faygo.

kiwi+strawberry faygo.description: A bottle of kiwi strawberry Faygo.

candy+apple faygo.description: A bottle of the legendary candy apple Faygo.
